events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund as it does not fit me and I would like to return it.
The case was classified under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for a refund and return of the jacket.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request for the customer’s jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund and return request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I ask when you received the jacket and if the package was unopened or used?
I received the jacket three days ago. I have tried it on once but have not removed any tags or damaged the packaging.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund if you ship the jacket back to us in its original condition. We will provide you with a prepaid return label.
That sounds great, thank you! Please send me the return label so I can send the jacket back as soon as possible.
I have emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions on how to return the jacket. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund after returning the jacket. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The refund case has been formally closed as the customer confirmed the refund was received and they have no further questions.
